title: Is it possible to get tokens from Ascension?
body: I recently got an S- with my LeBlanc who is mastery 5. S- should count as a token for mastery five, so I'm wondering if the game mode is a factor

replies.body: Most matchmaking modes have a grading system now, but[ tokens are only available through summoner's rift](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) currently.  Still, congrats on that S!  Let me know if that clears things up!
Oh okay thanks! just wanted to know. I love playing Leblanc so that was happy news. Have a nice day!
